summary: As the truth behind the girls' contracts with Kyubey is revealed, Madoka has to make the ultimate decision to either see those she love the most die before her eyes or to sacrifice her life as a normal girl and help out her friends in need.
cast: Aoi Yûki|Chiwa Saitô|Eri Kitamura|Kaori Mizuhashi|Ai Nonaka|Emiri Kato|Ryôko Shintani|Yûko Gotô|Tetsuya Iwanaga|Junko Iwao|Seiko Yoshida|Dai Matsumoto|Yoshitsugu Matsuoka|Hideyuki Umezu|Mizuki Nakamura|Rumi Okubo|Rei Matsuzaki|Ayane Sakura|Christine Marie Cabanos|Kyle Hebert|Carrie Keranen|Lauren Landa|Shelby Lindley|Jason Charles Miller|Marianne Miller|Cassandra Lee Morris|Carrie Savage|Karen Strassman|Cristina Valenzuela|Sarah Anne Williams
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part II: Eternal
